ygData.subject: RE: [Holy Swords]
ygData.msgSnippet: it comes from the Guk King in lower guk on the live side.  it is actually dmg 21 del 40, a nd does have haste effect which is probably 10 to 20% increase in
ygData.messageBody:
it comes from the Guk King in lower guk on the live side. it is actually
dmg 21 del 40, a nd does have haste effect which is probably 10 to 20%
increase in attack speed (any hard numbers on this?). while easier than
soulfire, it is still not easy to get, as the Guk King is the toughest mob
in the zone, and has 5 friends nearby to help him out.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 16 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
> I believe it comes from lower guk, rare drop and stuff..
> Stats are like, damage 25 delay 40, AND it has permanent
> effect haste, which cuts down delay by 25%, so the delay is
> really 30.. 25/30.. DROOL!
>
